name: ATtiny85-Gameplay
description: Automated Wi-Fi credential extraction and Chrome password decryption using ATtiny85 microcontroller. This hardware security project demonstrates USB HID emulation for automated credential harvesting and PowerShell-based data extraction in controlled environments.

name: MealMetrics
description: AI-powered Telegram bot for nutrition tracking. Send a meal photo and get instant calorie analysis with personalized health recommendations. Features smart food recognition and accurate nutritional insights.

name: LinuxBuddy
description: Your friendly companion to mastering Linux! Learn system administration, VPS deployment, and become a Linux expert. A structured learning platform to learn Linux.

name: K1NGB0B Recon Script
description: A simple and efficient domain reconnaissance tool designed for bug bounty hunters and security researchers. Automated tool for domain reconnaissance.

name: AI Opportunity Map Dashboard
description: A comprehensive, interactive dashboard for exploring AI industry trends, opportunities, and strategic decision-making pathways. Built with Streamlit and designed for businesses and individuals navigating the AI revolution.

name: KingBOB Web Crawler
description: This Python script allows systematic browsing and extraction of links from websites up to a specified depth. It is ideal for site audit, and exploring web structures.

name: LinkedIn Data Scraping Suite
description: A comprehensive Playwright-based automation toolkit for scraping LinkedIn data including connections, search results, and posts.

name: Daily Personal Planner
description: Daily planner web application built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include task management, calendar integration, and responsive design. Use this password : arafat69

name: E-commerce Backend
description: A robust e-commerce backend built with Node.js and TypeScript, featuring Express.js and Mongoose for database management.

name: Binary Exploitation Buffer Overflow Starter Code
description: A collection of Python scripts and exercises for practicing binary exploitation and buffer overflow techniques.

name: AES Crypto 256 Bits by KingBOB
description: Python scripts for encrypting and decrypting text files using the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode with a 256-bit key.

name: SecureShare
description: SecureShare is a revolutionary Chrome extension that solves a common problem: sharing access to online accounts without compromising security. Using military-grade encryption, it allows you to share your logged-in sessions temporarily without ever revealing your passwords.

name: MissionDeck
description: Mission Control for your AI Agent Army. A cyberpunk-themed Kanban task management dashboard with drag-and-drop, multi-agent authentication, full CRUD persistence to Vercel Postgres (Neon), optimistic updates, and a JARVIS-inspired dark UI with scanlines and glow effects.

name: README Beautifier
description: Transform GitHub README files into professional documentation with AI-powered formatting. Features drag-and-drop upload, GitHub repo import, auto-beautify with grammar and structure fixes, 40+ shields.io badges, real-time quality scoring, live split-view preview, and a full tools suite including table formatter, emoji picker, and license generator.

name: Arafat Git Study
description: An interactive learning platform to master Git and GitHub from beginner to advanced. Features 4 structured learning paths with 26+ lessons covering basics, remote operations, collaboration, and advanced techniques like rebase and squash. Built with a terminal-inspired mint-green UI.

name: Startise Bookclub
description: A full-stack book club application with React frontend and Express.js backend. Features user authentication with JWT, book management, reading progress tracking, and a polished UI built with Radix UI, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Backend powered by MongoDB with Mongoose.

name: WordPress Plugin DB
description: A powerful web app for browsing, searching, and downloading 60,000+ WordPress plugins from the official repository. Features advanced filtering by install count, bulk CLI command generation, one-click WP-CLI install commands, personal notes system, and paginated card-based UI with plugin icons.

name: GitHub PR Extractor
description: A cross-platform browser extension (Chrome & Firefox) that extracts titles with links from any GitHub page â€” PRs, Issues, Milestones, Repos, Releases, and more. Features inline hover-to-copy as rich text links and a popup for bulk extraction in Markdown, Plain, HTML, or CSV formats.
